attributes.action: ask for the prime minister to remove the ban that stops all direct flights to Ercan airport in northen Cyprus .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
basicly what the above sentence says. i would like it to be applied before  25 july 09 but anytime after would be extreamly apretated. many people have  been saying that the british government is racist because of this ban. the british govenment has stated that they want to help the negotiations regarding northen cyprus and said that removing the ban on diect flights to northen cyprus would help these negotiations happen but...

still you wont let this happen  under highly crritsized terms.


the other pettions are closed so i could not reply so i made this one.

please remove the ban. i want a quick flight to Ercan not a long one that contributes to global warming. i want to reduce my carbon footprint and not increase it.
attributes.creator_name: dont make me tell you plz

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
